metadata.title: CVE-2015-5739 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The net/http library in net/textproto/reader.go in Go before 1.4.3 does notproperly parse HTTP header keys, which allows remote attackers to conductHTTP request smuggling attacks via a space instead of a hyphen, asdemonstrated by "Content Length" instead of "Content-Length."

criterions.comment: gcc-5 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
gcc-5 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
